mapper.delete: delete from game_skill_info where 1=1 and skillid = #{0}
mapper.update: update game_skill_info set skillname = #{skillname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skilltype = #{skilltype, jdbcType=INTEGER}, skillflag = #{skillflag, jdbcType=INTEGER}, skillfrom = #{skillfrom, jdbcType=INTEGER}, initlevel = #{initlevel, jdbcType=INTEGER}, maxlevel = #{maxlevel, jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prop = #{prop, jdbcType=INTEGER}, target = #{target, jdbcType=INTEGER}, direct = #{direct, jdbcType=INTEGER}, mode = #{mode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, valtype = #{valtype, jdbcType=INTEGER}, initvalue = #{initvalue, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, upvalue = #{upvalue, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, princetype = #{princetype, jdbcType=INTEGER}, prince = #{prince, jdbcType=INTEGER} where 1=1 and skillid = #{skillid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
